title: Add FO-03 KV store entries to seed.ts
description:
Add FO-03 prompt templates and configuration to the KV store seed.

File to modify:
- src/db/seed.ts

Entries to add (following FO-02 pattern):
- versions.fo-03._temperature.default - temperature setting (e.g., 0.7)
- versions.fo-03._system_prompt.default - agent system instructions
- versions.fo-03.prompt_initial - initial batch prompt template
- versions.fo-03.prompt_with_feedback - subsequent batch prompt template

Templates should use Liquid syntax with variables:
- {{ name }}
- {{ familiarity }}
- {{ topics }} (array)
- {{ situation_text }}, {{ situation_chips }}
- {{ feelings_text }}, {{ feelings_chips }}
- {{ whatHelps_text }}, {{ whatHelps_chips }}
- {{ approvedAffirmations }}, {{ skippedAffirmations }} (for feedback batches)

After adding, run: npm run db:seed
acceptance_criteria: npm run db:seed succeeds; grep -l 'fo-03' src/db/seed.ts returns the file
closed_reason: Added FO-03 KV store entries: _info, _model_name, _temperature, prompt_initial, and prompt_with_feedback templates. Templates use Liquid syntax with all FO-03 context variables (name, familiarity, topics, situation_text/chips, feelings_text/chips, whatHelps_text/chips) plus feedback arrays.
